data.text:
For which of the following measurement, unit 'Nali' is used in the rural areas of Uttarakhand?

Width of river

Length of the road

Land

Tree

Answer (Detailed Solution Below)

Option 3 : Land

Detailed Solution

Download Solution PDF

The correct answer is Land.

Key Points

The Nali is a traditional unit of area.

Nali is used for land measurement in Uttarakhand. Mutthi is a sub unit of Nali for area.

Nali being an old unit of area, people want to know the value of Nali converted in standard units of land area which are more common.

The value of Nali in Sq ft. (1 Nali = 2160 sq ft = 240 sq yard).
